(In reply to comment #0)

I get exactly the same error when I install the Hibernate Tools plug-ins on a fresh install of 3.2M5. The Eclipse install that I use has GEF, EMF, VE and WST installed since at first I thought it was 3.1 plugin depedencies in the Hibernate Tools but hacking the distro from Hibernate to depend on 3.2 did not fix the problem. I do notice that there is a commons-logging-1.0.4.jar in the org.apache.axis and the Hibernate Tools /lib AND that there is a commons-logging-api.jar in org.eclipse.tomcat. Could this be the problem? A conflict in the order of which commons jar get loaded first by the classloader???

BTW: I did this on a Windows XP box.

Actually yes this is the problem. It was caused by the fix for 113252, which was rolled back, so this problem should no longer exist in the latest builds. I'm closing this one - please try the latest integration build, and if you still see the problem you can reopen.
Added comment to https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=113252 which is the original bug.
